name: Expand UP – Multiple Search Ajax Popup FREE
author: Expand UP WP

sections.installation:
Install via WordPress Admin

  1. Ready the zip file of the plugin
  2. Go to Admin > Plugins > Add New
  3. On the upper portion click the Upload link
  4. Using the file upload field, upload the plugin zip file here and activate the plugin

Install via FTP

  1. First unzip the plugin file
  2. Using FTP go to your server\’s wp-content/plugins directory
  3. Upload the unzipped plugin here
  4. Once finished login into your WP Admin and go to Admin > Plugins
  5. Look for Coyote Prev and Next and activate it

Usage

  1. After installed the plugin, you need to configure settings.
  2. Ready to be happy.
sections.faq:
Is it resposive?

Yes.

Is it free?

Yes.

Does this plugin work with Woocommerce products?

Yes. Pro Version only
sections.description:
Short Description

Plugin for conducting AJAX searches and displaying results in a popup; the results are displayed in a segmented manner

General

  • Plugin for conducting AJAX searches and displaying results in a popup; the results are displayed in a segmented manner

Features

  • Comprehensive Search: Don’t limit yourself to standard results. With our plugin, users can search for any term and access information from various sources in a single query.
  • Segmented Results: Say goodbye to confusion. Provide separate results by segment, whether it’s products, posts, events, news, ebooks, courses, or whatever you desire.
  • Customizable Configuration: Tailor the plugin to meet your site’s specific needs. Choose the sources of information and segments you want to include in the search.
  • Simplified Navigation: Users can easily find what they’re looking for thanks to clear result organization.
  • Improved User Retention: A more efficient search experience can boost user satisfaction and keep them on your site longer.
  • Seamless Integration: Our plugin seamlessly integrates with WordPress, ensuring a smooth and user-friendly implementation.

Demo: Live Preview
Documentation: View Documentation
Contact Support: Support Form

Pro Version

  • WooCommerce Integration
  • Customize Popup Header Colors
  • Customize Popup Footer Colors

PRO version: Get Now

Native language

  • Native language: English International
  • Translation: PT_BR

upgrade_notice:
IMPORTANT: Before you update your plugin make sure you have made a copy of your database.

Note: In some cases occurs plugin be disabled after the update, do not panic, you will not lose your job, just turn it on again and all the arrows will be there.
